name: Lickilicky
flavorText:
It wraps things with its extensible
tongue. Getting too close to it
will leave you soaked with drool.

previous.name: Magnezone
previous.flavorText:
It evolved from exposure to a
special magnetic field.
Three units generate magnetism.

next.name: Rhyperior
next.flavorText:
It puts rocks in holes in its palms
and uses its muscles to shoot them.
GEODUDE are shot at rare times.

pokemon.name: Lickitung
pokemon.flavorText:
Its tongue can be
extended like a
chameleon's. It leaves a tingling
sensation when it
licks enemies.
